name: api
description: Sistema API completo per il sito IT-ERA Bulltech basato su Cloudflare Workers, che include:

scripts.create-kv: npm run kv:contact && npm run kv:analytics && npm run kv:quotes
scripts.kv:contact: wrangler kv:namespace create CONTACT_KV && wrangler kv:namespace create CONTACT_KV --preview
scripts.kv:analytics: wrangler kv:namespace create ANALYTICS_KV && wrangler kv:namespace create ANALYTICS_KV --preview
scripts.kv:quotes: wrangler kv:namespace create QUOTES_KV && wrangler kv:namespace create QUOTES_KV --preview
scripts.db:create: wrangler d1 create it-era-contacts && wrangler d1 create it-era-analytics
scripts.db:init: wrangler d1 execute it-era-contacts --file=./schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute it-era-analytics --file=./schema.sql
